alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 14 at 3:39PM CDT until June 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 293 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ARKANSAS ASHLEY CHICOT IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA EAST CARROLL FRANKLIN MADISON MOREHOUSE RICHLAND TENSAS WEST CARROLL IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 42 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW COPIAH HINDS HOLMES HUMPHREYS LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT SIMPSON SMITH YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CLARKE JASPER KEMPER LAUDERDALE NESHOBA NEWTON NOXUBEE WINSTON IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA LEFLORE MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN NORTHEAST MISSISSIPPI CLAY LOWNDES OKTIBBEHA IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI BOLIVAR SUNFLOWER WASHINGTON IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI JEFFERSON DAVIS LAWRENCE LINCOLN IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI COVINGTON JONES IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI CLAIBORNE JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, ANGUILLA, BASSFIELD, BASTROP, BAY SPRINGS, BELZONI, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BROOKSVILLE, CANTON, CARROLLTON, CARTHAGE, CLEVELAND, COLLINS, COLUMBUS, CONEHATTA, CROSSETT, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DE KALB, DECATUR, DELHI, DERMOTT, DURANT, EPPS, EUDORA, EUPORA, FAYETTE, FOREST, GOODMAN, GREENVILLE, GREENWOOD, GRENADA, HAMBURG, HAZLEHURST, HEIDELBERG, INDIANOLA, ISOLA, JACKSON, KOSCIUSKO, LAKE PROVIDENCE, LAKE VILLAGE, LAUREL, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MACON, MADISON, MAGEE, MATHISTON, MAYERSVILLE, MENDENHALL, MERIDIAN, MONTICELLO, MORTON, MOUNT OLIVE, NEW HEBRON, NEWELLTON, NEWTON, NORTH CARROLLTON, NORTH CROSSETT, OAK GROVE, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, PRENTISS, QUITMAN, RALEIGH, RAYVILLE, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, RULEVILLE, SCOOBA, SHUBUTA, ST. JOSEPH, STARKVILLE, STONEWALL, TALLULAH, TAYLORSVILLE, TCHULA, UNION, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, WATERPROOF, WEIR, WESSON, WEST CROSSETT, WEST POINT, WINNSBORO, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
